entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Pitt Meadows
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:44 AM PST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pitt Meadows 11:00 AM PST Saturday 21 January 2023
Temperature: 2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 1.3°C
Wind: WNW 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Saturday: Rain mixed with snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain at times mixed with snow. Local snowfall amount 4 cm over higher terrain. High plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers early this evening. 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 21 January 2023
